---
title: "data_generator"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
n = 204
scout_initials = sample(c("NS","HR"), size=n, replace=TRUE)
match_number = floor(seq(from=4,to=(n+3))/4)
robot_loc = rep(c("R1", "R2", "B1", "B2"), n/4)
team_number = sample(c("118", "422", "449", "1690", "1727", "2106", "3937", "4414", "5026", "6767", "9072", "8590", "2910", "1323", "254", "2056", "1678", "5940", "359"), size=n, replace=TRUE)
starting_position = sample(c("I","O"), size=n, replace=TRUE)
no_show = sample(c(TRUE,FALSE), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,99))
auto_lunites_missed = sample(c(0:3), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(2,1,1,2))
auto_lunites_high = sample(c(0:3), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(4:1))
auto_lunites_low = sample(c(0:6), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(7:1))
moved = sample(c(TRUE,FALSE), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(9,1))
ground_intake_auto = sample(c(TRUE,FALSE), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,9))
teleop_preshutdown_high_lunites_scored = sample(c(0:10), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,5,4,3,2,1))
teleop_preshutdown_low_lunites_scored = sample(c(0:7), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,2,3,4,4,3,2,1))
teleop_preshutdown_lunites_missed = sample(c(0:5), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,2,3,3,2,1))
teleop_preshutdown_lunites_passed = sample(c(0:5), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,2,3,3,2,1))
end_position=sample(c("none","park","linked"),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(3:1))
bunnies_inside=sample(c(0:3),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(0:3))
tele_op_ground_intake=sample(c(TRUE,FALSE),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,9))
general_comments=sample(c("0", "1", "2", "3", ""),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(20,1,1,1,20))
defense_fouls=ifelse(general_comments=="0", sample(c(0:4),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(5:1)), 0)
defense_rating=ifelse(general_comments=="0", sample(c(0:5),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=2 ^ c(6:1)), 0)
post_high_lunites_scored=sample(c(0:7),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,2,3,4,4,3,2,1))
post_low_lunites_scored=sample(c(0:9),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,2,3,4,5,5,4,3,2,1))
post_lunites_missed=sample(c(0:5),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,2,3,3,2,1))
post_lunites_passed=sample(c(0:10),size=n,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,5,4,3,2,1))
postmatch_driver_ranking = sample(c(1:5), size=n, replace=TRUE)
postmatch_difficulties = sample(c("NA","ls","ba","di","de","t"), size=n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(5,1,1,1,1,1))

df <- data.frame(scout_initials, match_number, robot_loc, team_number, starting_position, no_show, auto_lunites_missed, auto_lunites_high, auto_lunites_low, moved, ground_intake_auto, teleop_preshutdown_high_lunites_scored, teleop_preshutdown_low_lunites_scored, teleop_preshutdown_lunites_missed, teleop_preshutdown_lunites_passed, end_position, bunnies_inside, tele_op_ground_intake, general_comments, defense_fouls, defense_rating, post_high_lunites_scored, post_low_lunites_scored, post_lunites_missed, post_lunites_passed, postmatch_driver_ranking, postmatch_difficulties)

write_csv(df, file = "shinyapp/data_files/fake_data.csv")
```
